mapper.select: select n.id, n.operate, n.task_id as taskId, n.create_time as createTime, t.title as taskTitle, m.id as memberId, m.nick_name as memberNickName, m.sex as memberSex, m.avatar as memberAvatar from t_im_task_notice n join t_task t on t.id = n.task_id join member m on n.member_id=m.id where n.deleted=0 and n.member_id = #{memberId} ORDER BY n.create_time DESC LIMIT #{page.offset},#{page.limit}
select count(1) from t_im_task_notice n join t_task t on t.id = n.task_id join member m on n.member_id=m.id where n.deleted=0 and n.member_id = #{memberId}
